extendedInfo.description: Make your high speed rail journey a breeze from the off with the official Eurostarapp. Itâs completely free with no subscription, so download it now for quick,simple bookings on the move and even faster check-in with just a quick scan ofyour mobile.It also lets you keep up to date on the move with indispensable service updatesand FAQs on your mobile.FeaturesQuick search & bookingâ¢ Search and book Eurostar journeys between London, Paris and Brussels andall Eurostar stops in between.Mobile ticketingâ¢ Retrieve any booking youâve made directly with Eurostar, be it via the app, oneurostar.com, with our contact centre or in our stations.â¢ Generate your mobile ticket and check-in with a quick scan of your mobile.â¢ Your mobile ticket is available as soon as youâve booked and once youâvegenerated it you can access it even when youâre offline.Store your profile for faster future bookingsâ¢ Save your contact information and seating preferences and save time forfuture bookings.Express exchange for Business Premierâ¢ Exclusively for Business Premier travellers, express exchange offers ultimateflexibility when plans change.Access your loyalty accountsâ¢ Earn membership points for Eurostarâ¢ Frequent Traveller and Eurostar PlusPoints and keep up to date with your balance at the touch of a screen.

reviews.title: Update? What update?
reviews.comment: Every time I open the app it tells me I need to install the latest version, and yet there is no updated version available on the store. And the app that is installed does not work anyway. Terrible.
reviews.author: Andrew Shepley

reviews.title: Hopeless
reviews.comment: This app is hopeless, but then their website is useless too. Tells me no trains available for that chosen time of the day... But there was no box to even select \'time\'.....
reviews.author: Mike Dunphy

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: When trying to add bookings it keeps saying an error occurred.
reviews.author: Karel-Jan Misseghers

reviews.title: Was great but no longer works
reviews.comment: App used to work really well but now recognises bookings but cannot retrieve the ticket making it useless. Customer support were unsupportive.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very Nice App!
reviews.comment: I\'m looking forward to my own Willy Fog style adventure into the continent at some point.
reviews.author: Ed Hook

reviews.title: E-ticket is utter rubbish
reviews.comment: As I was just about to check in I fired up the app to display the e-ticket. The ticket shows fine except... the bar code, i.e. the only thing needed to check in. I am told by Eurostar personnel that my phone needs to be connected to internet to display the bar code (what about reliability and roaming charges?), or that I should have taken a screenshot of the app showing the bar code beforehand. This is absolutely ridiculous!
reviews.author: Marc Alzina

reviews.title: Update? What update?
reviews.comment: Load app, open, update or you cannot access your ticket. But there is no update. Uninstall, install, still useless.
reviews.author: J Russell

reviews.title: Very poor
reviews.comment: Comparing this app to the high quality one built by British airways makes this one seems very poor.   Every time I open the app, I\'m told that a new version is available and that tickets no longer work on the old version. However, I can\'t seem to find a new version in the Play store.   Also, I\'ve just booked travel for later this week, but the app tells me that the tickets are not aways available for journeys booked less than 48 hours in advance. Well, I booked this journey 3 days in advance...
reviews.author: Johan Lindstrom

reviews.title: Very Bad
reviews.comment: When trying to add booking it tells me there is an error and it keep saying it...very bad app, doesn\'t function and should be removed from the store.
reviews.author: Nayan Tank

reviews.title: Very poor. Hard to change dates, which is very basic.
reviews.comment: Changing the dates is difficult when using the calendar. It keeps reverting to the original date. Useless. Also, it does not give you the option to all Belgian stations where as the website does. Not liking it at all
reviews.author: Philippe Mathon

reviews.title: Rubbish
reviews.comment: Kafkaesque! It makes you guess at the timetable.... Again and again and again? Utterly pointless, uninstalling.
reviews.author: Nick Broughton

reviews.title: Very eurostar
reviews.comment: Nice idea poorly executed. ... and every \"improvement\" makes it worse. ...just like eurostar itself. ...well done!
reviews.author: Sean O\'Shea

reviews.title: Broken on GT-N7000
reviews.comment: Was fine until update on 11 June 2013. Now force closes every time during startup.
reviews.author: Richard Allan

reviews.title: Caribbean countries forgotten
reviews.comment: Would have been a good app except Caribbean countries don\'t seem to exist apparently. Everything was going smoothly until I had to put in credit card details and noticed that Trinidad and Tobago is not an option. In fact no Caribbean country seems to be there!
reviews.author: Camille Charles

reviews.title: No trains
reviews.comment: Ok there are no trains for a particular time. It would be nice to know what is available instead I have to go through ever hour until I get a train.i agree with other reviews,  bl&^&&% useless.
reviews.author: Laura Rose

reviews.title: poorly done
reviews.comment: poorly done. Caint add my own tickets, returning errors
reviews.author: KK Fan

reviews.title: Missing stations
reviews.comment: There seems to be a very limited choice of stations. Popular destinations such as disneyland Paris doesn\'t seem to be a searchable option unless I missed something
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Poor app
reviews.comment: Didn\'t understand it. Rubbish
reviews.author: Robert Ward

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: Thanks
reviews.author: Balazs Szonyi

reviews.title: It sucks!!
reviews.comment: Can\'t make my booing using this App.
reviews.author: brad lin
